title: Portal (Riding) and Outdoor Apparel
content:
Portal is a new outdoor apparel company that just launched last week. The team at Portal all Run, Ride and Hike trail, and were frustrated that the outdoor industry draws such distinct silos between activities. These activities are not so different in terms of both the mindset and often the clothing that you wear. Portalâ€™s founders have all worked in the industry for some time and just recently decided to use their experience to build something of their own.

Portal focuses on outdoor apparel, spanning cycling, running, and hiking. It offers various silhouttes ranging from riding shorts to t-shirt jerseys, jackets, hats, and more. Roll on over to Portal to check it out.
